Title: Not optimized for Wii
Text: I tried to run the app on my hack Nintendo Wii~ but it wouldn’t load properly.`Disappointing that you don’t support this platform.

Title: I want it in blue
Text: The yellow isn’t my style. Can we get the app in blue?

Title: Sound effects?
Text: I want the app to make cool whooshing sounds when I wave my phone around. How soon can you deliver this feature?
